modules.name: StudentCourseModule
modules.documentation: This module manages students, courses, and enrollments.

entities.name: Enrollment
entities.documentation: Represents an enrollment of a student in a course.

document.name: StudentOverview
document.documentation: Page to display an overview of students.

document.name: CourseOverview
document.documentation: Page to display an overview of courses.

document.name: EnrollmentOverview
document.documentation: Page to display an overview of enrollments.

document.name: ACT_CreateStudent
document.documentation: Creates a new student and opens the StudentEdit page.

document.name: ACT_CreateCourse
document.documentation: Creates a new course and opens the CourseEdit page.

document.name: ACT_CreateEnrollment
document.documentation: Creates a new enrollment and opens the EnrollmentEdit page.
